# iosxr_performance_measurement_interface (Resource)

This resource can manage the Performance Measurement Interface configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "iosxr_performance_measurement_interface" "example" {
  interface_name                      = "GigabitEthernet0/0/0/1"
  delay_measurement                   = true
  delay_measurement_advertise_delay   = 1000
  delay_measurement_profile_name      = "DELAY_PROFILE_1"
  delay_measurement_static_delay      = 1000000
  next_hop_ipv4                       = "10.0.0.1"
  path_tracing                        = true
  path_tracing_interface_id           = 100
  path_tracing_timestamp_template_st0 = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `interface_name` (String) Enable Performance Measurement on an interface

### Optional

- `delay_measurement` (Boolean) Enable delay-measurement on the interface
- `delay_measurement_advertise_delay` (Number) Advertisement delay (uSec)
  - Range: `1`-`16777215`
- `delay_measurement_fallback` (Boolean) Configure fallback mode for interfaces when computed delay metric is not available
- `delay_measurement_profile_name` (String) Profile name
- `delay_measurement_static_delay` (Number) Static delay
  - Range: `1`-`4294967295`
- `delete_mode` (String) Configure behavior when deleting/destroying the resource. Either delete the entire object (YANG container) being managed, or only delete the individual resource attributes configured explicitly and leave everything else as-is. Default value is `all`.
  - Choices: `all`, `attributes`
- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.
- `next_hop_ipv4` (String) IPv4 address
- `next_hop_ipv6` (String) IPv6 address
- `path_tracing` (Boolean) Enable path-tracing
- `path_tracing_interface_id` (Number) Config interface ID for path tracing
  - Range: `1`-`4095`
- `path_tracing_timestamp_template_st0` (Boolean) PTP timestamp nanosecond bits [8:15]
- `path_tracing_timestamp_template_st1` (Boolean) PTP timestamp nanosecond bits [12:19]
- `path_tracing_timestamp_template_st2` (Boolean) PTP timestamp nanosecond bits [16:23]
- `path_tracing_timestamp_template_st3` (Boolean) PTP timestamp nanosecond bits [20:27]

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the object.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import iosxr_performance_measurement_interface.example "<interface_name>"
```
